articles.description: Amazon is offering card discounts on three Xiaomi phones - Xiaomi 11X Pro, 11X, and 11 Lite NE. You can get up to Rs 4,000 instant discount.

articles.author: Allen Ngo
articles.title: HP Victus 16 gaming laptop on sale for $759 USD with Core i5 CPU, 144 Hz IPS display, and GeForce RTX 3050 Ti graphics - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The 8 GB of RAM and 256 GB SSD are laughable, but they are at least upgradeable. Gamers on tighter budgets may find good value out of the spacious 16.1-inch Victus 16.
articles.content: HP is currently holding a sale on its midrange Victus 16 gaming laptop. The system is notable for its uncommon 144 Hz 16.1-inch display whereas most other gaming laptops have slightly smaller 15.6-in… [+870 chars]
